name: Eternal Eclipse (itch) (Maria Deslis)
description:
Browser Version (Firefox is best for music) :EternalEclipseGame.com

Eternal Eclipse is a "light" puzzle game about healing and transforming in life.

Your goal is to hike to the top of the mountain to see the Eclipse in totality! However, once your hike begins, a mysterious and magical effect happens and a Sun stone begins to shine a beam of light at a Moon statue across from it. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to make it to the top of the mountain in time to see the Totality Eclipse while also rotating/changing the moon statues to reflect the beam of light from the bottom of the mountain to the top.  Once that happens, a magical transformation will occur, and the light that you were shining up to the top of the mountain is imbued in you!!

Design Goals and Intentions

The light, the sun, the moon, the mirrors/statues and the eclipse are all symbols in the game. They express  different parts of the transformative metaphor I tried to infuse into the game upon it's creation! 

The sun and moon each represent different parts of you, and the eclipse represents new beginnings and transformations. This could be anything from a hard or depressing experiencing you are going through right now or in the past - or perhaps just a reminder to use the light within you to grow and heal!

A Note From the Author

This game is currently in it's first mid/high-fidelity build. Any and all constructive comments, bug reports, etc. would be happily heard and worked on asap!

The current place for where this goal is good, but I have much bigger plans in the future for this game! Keep checking back for updates and more!
